ygData.subject: Re: Boat Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same problem on Erollisi Marr yesterday.  I took the boat from Freeport to BB and found that just sitting, my stamina went down a bubble at a time.
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same problem on Erollisi Marr yesterday. I took the boat from Freeport to BB and found that just sitting, my stamina went down a bubble at a time. Needless to say I started singing Jaxan's just in case I fell off the boat (which was unlikely because I wasn't moving) and had to swim for a while. There were 8 people on the boat and I could only see 2 and talk to none.

The stamina hit has never happened to me during boat travel before.

Weiland of Freeport
Erollisi Marr

I left my bard on the dock in BB. Now I'm rather afraid to take him back to Freeport via boat. I'm thinking about going to the bank in Kaladim and then using the "poor man's gate" (death) to get back. Any suggestions?



----- Original Message -----
From: Dan Harmon
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 10:14 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Boat Crashes


Yesterday afternoon on the Rathe server, my magician was travelling from BB to Freeport. There were 5 people in the zone, none of which were bards. When we entered the OOT, no one was there, and no one heard me when I /say'd. My roomie told me that she didn't hear or see me (also on the boat). Later in the trip, still in the OOT, one person showed up, but still no one saw my /say. We chatted in /ooc though.

BTW, on the boat, fully fed and watered, my mage completely ran out of stamina on the trip. Earlier in the day I took my bard over, and when I hit 1/2, I started singing the Jaxan's to bring it back up (I was alone on the boat), which worked.
